title: xplat CI builds should build full-framework and netcore MSBuild
body: Currently, the `RebuildWithLocalMSBuild.cmd` script that is the CI entry point only builds the `Debug-netcore` configuration of MSBuild in the xplat branch.  In preparation for branch unification, we need to make sure  MSBuild is working correctly in full-framework mode in that branch as well.

nodes.body: Lets rename that to something like cibuild.cmd though :)
This has been done for a while. We should add Mono soon.
